zooFacilities.name: Safari Ride
zooFacilities.description: Experience a thrilling ride through the zoo's safari park, where you can see lions, elephants, and giraffes up close in their natural habitats.

zooFacilities.name: Rainforest Walk
zooFacilities.description: Explore the lush rainforest environment on a guided walk that offers a glimpse of exotic birds, insects, and the unique flora of the rainforest ecosystem.

zooFacilities.name: reptile encounter zoo activity
zooFacilities.description: Get face to face with some of the world's most fascinating reptiles in a controlled environment. Learn about their habits and what makes them so important to the ecosystem.

zooFacilities.name: Penguin Parade
zooFacilities.description: Watch the delightful parade of penguins at our specialized penguin enclosure. An educational and fun experience for all ages.

zooFacilities.name: Butterfly Pavilion
zooFacilities.description: Enter a serene environment where hundreds of butterflies flutter around freely. Learn about different species of butterflies and the stages of their lifecycle.

zooFacilities.name: Children's Petting Zoo
zooFacilities.description: A safe and interactive zone for children to pet and learn about domestic animals such as goats, sheep, and rabbits.

zooFacilities.name: Adventure Climbing
zooFacilities.description: Challenge yourself with our adventure climbing courses suitable for all skill levels. Safety gear is provided and all activities are supervised by trained professionals.

zooFacilities.name: Zoo Train Tour
zooFacilities.description: Board the zoo train for a comfortable tour around the zoo, perfect for families with small children or those who prefer a leisurely pace.
